roles.title: Support Manager
roles.description: Lead and mentor a premium technical support team. Work with product and engineering teams to ensure resolution to critical issues. Develop tools to increase team productivity.

roles.title: Senior Customer Success Engineer
roles.description: Provided technical guidance to customers. Included reviewing log files, New Relic data, codebase structure/contents and identifying potential points of failure, as well as areas of improvement.

roles.title: Senior Developer
roles.description: Agile website development for progressive advocacy organizations. Spec writing, custom module development and advanced site building using modern build tools.

company: American Public Media | Minnesota Public Radio

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.description: Architected CMS-driven solutions for multimedia content creation and syndication. Continuously improved Drupal website performance.

roles.title: Multimedia Designer
roles.description: Designed and developed hands-on exhibits, data visualizations, and web experiences using Drupal and related web technologies.

roles.title: Client Services Manager/Developer
roles.description: Managed ongoing website needs of 250+ clients, working with a variety of PHP frameworks and eCommerce platforms.
